scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:api
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:orbit" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:pulse" "npm run dev:lore"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:orbit && npm run build:core && npm run build:pulse && npm run build:lore
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/nova-synth && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/nova-synth && npx prisma db seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/nova-synth && npm install && cd ../nova-orbit && npm install && cd ../nova-core && npm install && cd ../nova-pulse && npm install && cd ../nova-lore && npm install
